php.LBL_DISPLAY_TYPE_3: Polja vidno le v pogledu seznama
php.LBL_DISPLAY_TYPE_4: Field visible only in creating and in preview, cannot be modified
php.LBL_DISPLAY_TYPE_9: Field visible everywhere, hidden in creating and editing
php.LBL_DISPLAY_TYPE_10: Polje vidno povsod, ni ga mogoče urejati
php.LBL_FIELD_MASK_INFO:
Privzete definicije mask 
9: številčni
a: po abecedi
*: Alfanumerična

Primer:
(99) 9999-9999
+48 999-999-999
aaa_999_aaa
dd/mm/llll
php.PLL_SPLITED_RELATED_LIST: Mnogo na mnogo - z ločevanjem podatkov
php.LBL_INV_GROUP_LABEL_DESC: It allows you to group rows and give them a header.
php.LBL_INV_DISCOUNT_MARKUP_MODE_DESC: Default setting of field working mode.
php.LBL_INV_UNITPRICE_CURRENCY_CONVERT_DESC: A simple currency conversion button will be available next to the field.
php.LBL_INV_GROUP_VALUES_DESC: Entering a value in this field will change the displayed field to picklist.
php.LBL_INV_CURRENCY_RESET_DESC: Possibility to reset exchange rate settings (date, exchange rate). The parameter applies when there is more than one currency in the system.
php.LBL_DELETE_CUSTOM_BLOCKS: Ne moreš izbrisati sklopa po meri
php.LBL_CURRENCY_DESC: List of available currencies, adding a currency launches a mechanism that calculates prices based on the current exchange rate.
php.LBL_DISCOUNT_MODE_DESC: Seznam razpoložljivih načinov popusta: skupno ali posamezno.
php.LBL_TAX_MODE_DESC: Seznam razpoložljivih načinov davka: skupno ali posamezno.
php.LBL_COMMENT_DESC: WYSIWYG field used to enter any description to a given element, the field is collapsed in edition by default.
php.LBL_DISCOUNT_DESC: Numeric field used to enter discount value for a selected element, discounts can be selected from the list of available discounts. Summation can be customized in system administration
php.LBL_GROSS_PRICE_DESC: Non-editable field calculated automatically, contains the final price of an element (Price after discount + Tax).
php.LBL_ITEM_NAME_DESC: Mandatory basic field, specifies modules to select records from. Additionally includes limit settings to block record saving when the credit limit is reached.
php.LBL_QUANTITY_DESC: Številčno polje se uporablja za vnos količine za vsak zapis, npr. količine izdelka. Vrednost mora biti višja od nič.
php.LBL_UNIT_PRICE_DESC: Številčno polje se uporablja za vnos cene po enoti mere, npr. kol/EM.
php.LBL_TOTAL_PRICE_DESC: Non-editable field calculated automatically, contains the Net price for a given element. (Quantity * Unit price).
php.LBL_DISCOUNT_PRICE_DESC: Non-editable field calculated automatically, contains the Net price after discount (Net price - Discount).
php.LBL_TAX_DESC: Numeric field used to enter the tax value for a given element, tax can be selected from the list of available taxes.  Summation can be customized in system administration.
php.LBL_STRING_DESC: Dodatno polje v katero uporabnik vnese katero koli vrednost.
php.LBL_REFERENCE_DESC: Additional field used to relate a given element with any record in the system.
php.LBL_PURCHASE_DESC: Številčno polje, ki se uporablja za vnos nabavne nabavne cene.
php.LBL_MARGIN_DESC: Polje, ki ga ni mogoče urejati in se izračuna samodejno, vsebuje pa vrednost za dani element (cena z popustom - nabavna cena) brez davka.
php.LBL_MARGIN_PERCENT_DESC: Polje, ki ga ni mogoče urejati se izračuna samodejno, vsebuje vrednost dobička, izraženo v odstotkih.
php.LBL_PICKLIST_FIELD_DESC: Izbirni seznam z vrednostmi iz katerega koli polja izbranega modula
php.LBL_MAX_WIDTH_COLUMN_INFO: The percentage value in relation to the width of the window.
php.LBL_TABINDEX_INFO: Set desired field sequence to appear after clicking on the TAB key.
php.LBL_EXCEEDED_MAXIMUM_NUMBER_CHARACTERS_F: You exceeded the maximum number of 30 characters for field name.
php.LBL_RELATED_VIEW_TYPE_DESC: Select at least one display position for the block
php.LBL_EDIT_MANDATORY_INFO: Velja za celoten zapis. Če je izbrana možnost "Ne", se zapis lahko shrani brez kakršnih koli vrstic inventarja.
php.LBL_CHANGED_MODULE_TYPE_INFO: Module type change operation has been added to cron task queue.
php.LBL_EDIT_MAY_AFFECT_STABILITY: Spremembe polja lahko vplivajo na stabilnost sistema.
php.LBL_EDIT_MAY_AFFECT_STABILITY_DESC: Samo ljudje z ustreznim tehničnim znanjem bi morali ustvarjati in spreminjati polja v sistemu. Spreminjanje polja lahko vpliva na stabilnost sistema, zato priporočamo, da ga najprej izvedete v testnem okolju.
php.LBL_ACCOUNT_LOGGED_CONTACT: Account of contact currently logged in
php.LBL_OWNER_FROM_ACCOUNT_CONTACT: Assigned To from the Contact Account
php.LBL_USE_SORTING_FROM_FILTERS: Considers sorting of the selected item or keeps the default sorting
php.LBL_ALL_GROUPS_INFO: When the option is not selected it displays only accessible groups based on the selected modules in the group panel

js.JS_LENGTH_SHOULD_BE_LESS_THAN_EQUAL_TO: Length should be less than or equal to
js.JS_LENGTH_SHOULD_BE_MORE_THAN_EQUAL_TO: Length should be more than or equal to
js.JS_SAVE_THE_CHANGES_TO_UPDATE_FIELD_SEQU: Save the changes to update Field sequence
js.JS_UPDATE_SEQUENCE: New sequence of related modules has been saved
js.JS_DELETE_RELATION_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete?
js.JS_DELETE_INVENTORY_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to remove the element from the block?
js.JS_EXTENDED_MODULE: Ali ste prepričani, da želite spremeniti vrsto modula?
js.JS_EXIST_PICKLIST_NAME: This name is already used. Do you want to save it as shared picklist?
js.JS_ARE_YOU_SURE_YOU_WANT_TO_INACTIVE_FIE: Are you sure that you want to disable the field?
js.JS_COLUMN_LENGTH_CHANGE_WARNING: Changing the column length depending on the database size may take a while. If you changed the column length, please make sure you want to continue this process. You can only increase length
